g12Streams.title: Government of Twelve Teams
g12Streams.focus: Lead a table of twelve, disciple weekly, and multiply cells every six months.
g12Streams.nextStep: Ask your leader about joining a G12 table.

g12Streams.title: Cell Groups
g12Streams.focus: Weekly home and marketplace gatherings for worship, Word, and activation with every disciple involved.
g12Streams.rhythm: Cells meet once a week with monthly celebration together
g12Streams.nextStep: Join a local cell or start one with your leader.

g12Streams.title: PID (Personal Intentional Discipleship)
g12Streams.focus: One-on-one mentoring that reinforces identity, healing, and spiritual disciplines after the Encounter and consolidation journey.
g12Streams.rhythm: Weekly coffee conversations and daily check-ins for 6–8 weeks
g12Streams.nextStep: Request a PID mentor through your cell leader.

g12Streams.title: SUNYL (Starting Up Your New Life)
g12Streams.focus: Foundational sessions that ground new believers in Scripture, prayer, and the Holy Spirit immediately after receiving Jesus.
g12Streams.rhythm: Four lessons delivered right after salvation and before the Encounter weekend
g12Streams.nextStep: Complete SUNYL with your coach to prepare for the Encounter.

g12Streams.title: Encounter Retreat Movement
g12Streams.focus: Facilitate encounters with Jesus through pre-encounter classes, the weekend retreat, and post-encounter consolidation.
g12Streams.nextStep: Register for the next Encounter weekend.

g12Streams.title: School of Leaders
g12Streams.focus: Three levels of training that shape doctrine, leadership, and multiplication.
g12Streams.rhythm: Nine-week tracks that start every January, May, and September
g12Streams.nextStep: Complete consolidation and sign up for Level 1.

g12Streams.title: Consolidation & Follow-Up
g12Streams.focus: Forty-day devotionals, daily encouragement, and one-on-one mentoring for every new believer.

ministries.name: Usher Team
ministries.description: Creates a welcoming, secure, Spirit-ready atmosphere for every gathering—parking to altar.

ministries.name: Music Ministry
ministries.description: Leads the house in prophetic praise and worship, covering all G12 encounters and celebrations.

ministries.name: Technical Team
ministries.description: Oversees audio, lighting, broadcast, and stage management so the message is crystal clear online and on campus.

ministries.name: Media Team
ministries.description: Captures testimonies, manages social media, and designs visuals that amplify the G12 story throughout the week.
